variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v1
variable.description: 1. First, have you had a serious illness or injury that started or got worse in the last year? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v2
variable.description: 2. Have you been the victim of a serious physical attack, mugging, sexual assault or other assault? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v3
variable.description: 3. Have you been robbed or was your home burglarized? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v4
variable.description: 4. Have you lost a loved one due to violence? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v5
variable.description: 5. Has your house been shot at, or has there been gunfire in your neighborhood? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v6
variable.description: 6. Has anyone close to you died? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v7
variable.description: 7. Has a family member or close friend had a major illness or injury? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v8
variable.description: 8. Have you moved to a worse residence or neighborhood? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v9
variable.description: 9. Have you or anyone in your household lost a job? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v10
variable.description: 10. Have you retired from a job when you did not want to? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v11
variable.description: 11. Have you had a divorce or separation from your (husband/wife)? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v12
variable.description: 12. Were you raised up to age 16 by anyone other than your natural parents? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v13a
variable.description: 13a. Was that because one of your parents died, because they divorced or separated, or from some other reason? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v14a
variable.description: 14a. Did your father (or other important male caretaker) ever work for pay while you were growing up? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]
variable.value: There was no father/ male caretaker in household

variable.name: AF1v15a
variable.description: 15a. What is the highest degree or years of school your father (or important male caretaker) completed, including trade or vocational school or college? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]
variable.value: Some vocational or trade school, but no certificates
Graduate or professional schools (MA, MS, Master's Doctorate, MD, JD, DDS, DVM, etc.)

variable.name: AF1v15b
variable.description: 15b. Did he complete a GED? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v16a
variable.description: 16a. Did your mother (or other important female caretaker) ever work for pay while you were growing up? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]
variable.value: There was no father/ male caretaker in household

variable.name: AF1v17a
variable.description: 17a. What is the highest degree or years of school your mother (or important female caretaker) completed, including trade or vocational school or college? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]
variable.value: Some vocational or trade school, but no certificates
Graduate or professional schools (MA, MS, Master's Doctorate, MD, JD, DDS, DVM, etc.)

variable.name: AF1v17b
variable.description: 17b. Did she complete a GED? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v18
variable.description: 18. When you were growing up, did your parents own or were buying their home, pay rent, or had some other living arrangement, such as living with relatives, etc.? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v19a
variable.description: 19a. Thinking about the place you lived until you were age 10, did it have indoor plumbing? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v19b
variable.description: 19b. Thinking about the place you lived until you were age 10, did it have electricity? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v19c
variable.description: 19c. Thinking about the place you lived until you were age 10, how many rooms did it have? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v20a
variable.description: 20a. When you were growing up, did your family own or have a refrigerator? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v20b
variable.description: 20b. When you were growing up, did your family own or have a car? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v20c
variable.description: 20c. When you were growing up, did your family have a telephone? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v20d
variable.description: 20d. When you were growing up, did your family have a television? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: AF1v20e
variable.description: 20e. When you were growing up, did your family have air conditioning? [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]

variable.name: VERS
variable.description: FORM VERSION [A, B] [Visit 2] [First Year Questionnaire, AF1]
